DOC.brief_summary: Overtesting Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) Pulmonary Embolism ( PE ) low risk Emergency Department ( ED ) patient increase exposure nondiseased patient radiation , intravenous contrast anticoagulation . This project address question whether quantitative Pre-Test Probability ( PTP ) assess two validate web-based computer algorithm ( project `` webtool '' ) , improve diagnostic evaluation adult patient chart evidence chest pain dyspnea . After validation phase , main study randomize patient either Standard care group Intervention group , receive output ACS PE webtool include PTP estimate ACS PE one three recommendation regard next step : 1 . No testing , 2 . Exclusion biomarker protocol , 3 . Immediate image +/- empiric anticoagulation .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Acute Disease Reduce Imaging Costs
DOC.criteria: I . Inclusion criterion Adult ( > 17 year ) ED patient report history chest discomfort new worsen shortness breath breathe difficulty , document write history present illness review system . Patient must understand English certify translator present . Physician order plan order 12lead electrocardiogram . Patient indicate site hospital `` hospital choice '' event return visit within 14 day . II . Prerandomization exclusion criterion 12lead ECG ST deviation interpret acute infarction ischemia . Known diagnosis acute PE within previous 24 hour ( e.g. , call back overread CT scan ) . `` Code STEMI '' patient ( patient suspect acute myocardial infarction ) . Other obvious condition diagnosis identify emergency physician mandate admission ( evidence circulatory shock , severe hypoxemia , decompensated heart failure , alter mental status , hemorrhage , sepsis syndrome , arrhythmia , trauma , unstable social psychiatric situation , stroke , aortic disaster , pneumonia ) . Myocardial infarction , intracoronary stent placement , CABG within previous 30 day . Known cocaine use within past 72 hour , base upon patient laboratory report . Referral emergency department personal physician . Patients undergo voluntary medical clearance detox center involuntary court magistrate order . Computer interpretation 12lead ECG contain either `` ischemia '' `` infarction '' . Homelessness , outoftown residence condition know preclude followup 14 day . Patients police custody currently incarcerate individual . Patients know pregnant pregnancy test drawn part usual care find positive . III . Postrandomization exclusion Positive urine cocaine test . Incarceration within 14 day enrollment . Patient elopement medical care ( i.e. , patient leave medical advice ) .
